sentence.text: The best thing to do when an old galvanised cistern has started to rust is to replace it with a modern plastic type .
The ladder is broken ; it has rusted through because I left it out in the rain .
I 've known them fitted with steel screws which rust in , making it necessary to break the china away and remove the screws later with a pair of Molegrips .
I traced the problem to the fixing rivets inside the wheel rims which had rusted badly and were puncturing the inner tubes of the 7,50 x 16 Avon Rangers .
And there was her key , its gun-metal grey shaft rusted brown but the handle still gleaming .
The embossed iron doors were rusting and one of them had fallen off its hinges .
Here , too , metal reinforcements set in the concrete have rusted because the concrete contained too much calcium chloride .
Our old metal gutters are rusting badly -- what should I replace them with ?
Oak is an acidic timber , which will cause iron fixings such as nails and screws to rust through very quickly , especially outdoors , where water may be present in large quantities in winter .
Most sealant guns are made of metal , which soon rusts , and they do n't come with any instructions on how to use them .
Now , the Berlin Wall has fallen and the barbed wire rusts away .
Other visitors might have seen the business-card as merely a piece of litter -- it could have stayed there , its drawing-pins slowly rusting , for years ; but Flaubert gave it function .
Steel , however , rusts much more quickly than wrought iron .
These are rarely found complete as the blades are generally made of iron and have therefore rusted away .

The case concerned a rusty old car which had belonged to one M. The structure of the car had rusted at the sides of the engine compartment and M had attempted to repair this with plastic body filler .
The covers may have rusted badly and the handles broken off , in which case the best tool to lift them is a garden spade inserted under the rim , followed by a stout length of wood .
It 's quite likely that the screws holding the brackets will have rusted in place .
